message: Hi, I'm going through a tough financial time and I'm worried about keeping up with my insurance payments. Can you help?

I'm truly sorry to hear about your current situation. We're here to support you through these times. Before we proceed, for security, can you confirm your full name, your date of birth, and the first line of address and postcode?
Yes, my name is Chris Martin, born on August 19, 1982, living at 123 Bridge Road, Waterford, WF2 1BD.

Thank you, Chris, for the information. Let's see what options we have to help alleviate some of your financial burdens. Would you prefer to discuss possible adjustments to your policy to lower your premium, or are you looking for a payment plan solution?
I didn't know that was possible. I think adjusting my policy might help. What options do I have?

We can look into reducing some of the coverages that are not essential or increasing your deductible to lower your premium. Another option might be to switch to a policy that better fits your current needs and budget. I'm here to work with you to find the best solution.
Increasing the deductible sounds like it might work. How much would that lower my premium?

Increasing your deductible can significantly reduce your monthly premium. For example, increasing it by $200 could reduce your premium by up to 10-15%. I can calculate the exact numbers based on your policy if you'd like?
Yes, please. That would be really helpful.
Great, give me a moment to work out the details for you.
Based on the adjustment to your deductible, your new premium would be X amount. This change will be effective immediately upon your confirmation. How does that sound?
That sounds much more manageable. Let's go ahead with that change.
Perfect, I've updated your policy with the new deductible. You'll receive a confirmation email shortly with the new details. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's everything. Thank you so much for understanding and for your help today.
You're very welcome, Chris. If you have any future questions or need further assistance, don't hesitate to reach out. Take care and have a good day.
